Translations.Text: Kiya inn logon nay zamin mein chal phir ker iss ka moaeena nahi kiya kay inn say pehlay kay logon ka nateeja kiya hua? Allah ney unhen halak ker diya aur kafiron kay liye iss tarah ki sazayen hain
Woh iss liye kay eman walon ka kaar saaz khud Allah Taalaa hai aur iss liye kay kafiron ka koi kaar saaz nahi

Jo log eman laye aur unhon ney nek aemaal kiye unhen Allah Taalaa aisay baghon mein dakhil keray ga jinn kay neechay nehren beh jari hain aur jo log kafir huye woh (duniya hi ka) faeedah utha rahey hain aur misil chopayon kay kha rahey hain unn ka asal thikana jahannum hai
Hum ney kitni bastiyon ko jo taqat mein teri iss basti say ziyadah thin jiss say tujhay nikala hum ney unhen halak ker diya jinka madadgar koi na utha
Kiya pus woh shaks jo apnay perwerdigar ki taraf say dalil per ho uss shaks jaisa ho sakta hai? Jiss kay liye uss ka bura kaam muzayyan ker diya gaya ho aur woh apni nafsani khuwaishon ka pero ho

Uss jannat ki sift jiss ka perhezgaron say wada kiya gaya hai yeh hai kay uss mein pani ki nehren hain jo badboo kernay wala nahi aur doodh ki nehren hain jinka maza nahi badla aur sharab ki nehren hain jinn mein peenay walon kay liye bari lazzat hai aur nehren hain shehad ki jo boht saaf hain aur unn kay liye wahan her qisam kay meway hain aur unkay rab ki taraf say maghfirat hai kiya yeh misil iss kay hain jo hamesha aag mein rehnay wala hai? Aur jihen garam kholta hua pani pilaya jaye ga jo inn ki aanton kay tukray tukray ker dey ga

Aur inn mein baaz (aisay bhi hain kay) teri taraf kaan lagatay hain yahan tak kay jabb teray pass say jatay hain to ehl-e-ilm say (ba-waja kund zehni-o-laperwahee kay) poochtay hain kay iss ney abhi kiya kaha tha? Yehi log hain jinn kay dilon per Allah ney mohar ker di hai aur woh apni khuawishon ki perwi kertay hain
Aur jo log hidayat yafta hain Allah ney unhen hidayat mein aur barha diya hai aur unhen unki perhezgari ata farmaee hai
To kiya yeh qayamat ka intezar ker rahe hain kay woh inn kay pass achanak aajaye yaqeenan iss ki alamaten to aa chuki hain phir jabkay inn kay pass qayamat aajaye enhen naseehat kerna kahan hoga

So (aey nabi) aap yaqeen kerlen kay Allah kay siwa koi mabood nahi aur apnay gunahon ki bakhsish manga keren aur momin mardon aur momin aurton kay haq mein bhi Allah tum logo ki amdoraft ki aur rehnay sehnay ki jagah khoob janta hai

Aur jo log eman laye woh kehtay hain koi soorat kiyon nazil nahi ki gaee? Phir jab koi saaf matlab wali soorat nazil ki jati hai aur iss mein qitaal ka ziker kiya jata hai to aap dekhtay hain jinn logon kay dilon mein beemari hai woh aap ki taraf iss tarah dekhtay hain jaisay uss shaks ki nazar hoti hai jiss per mot ki beyhoshi taari ho pus boht behtar tha unn kay liye
Farman ka baja lana aur achi baat ka kehna. Phir jab kaam muqarrar hojaye to agar Allah kay sath sachay rahen to unn kay liye behtri hai
Aur tum say yeh bhi baeed nahi kay tum ko agar hukumat mill jaye to tum zamin per fasad berpa kerdo aur rishtay natay tor dalo
Yeh wohi log hain jinn per Allah ki phitkaar hai aur jinn ki samaat aur aankhon ki roshni cheen li hai
Kiya yeh quran mein ghor-o-fiker nahi kertay? Ya inn kay dilon per unn kay talay lag gaye hain
Jo log apni peeth kay bal ultay phir gaye iss kay baad kay unn kay liye hidayat wazeh ho chuki yaqeenan shetan ney unn kay liye (unkay fail ko) muzayyen ker diya hai aur unhen dheel day rakhi hai

Yeh iss liye kay unhon ney inn logon say jinhon ney Allah ki nazil kerdah wahee ko bura samjha yeh kaha kay hum bhi unqareeb baaz kamon mein tumhara kaha manen gay aur Allah unki posheedah batein khoob janta hai
Pus unki kaisi (durgat) hogi jabkay farishtay unki rooh qabaz kertay huye unkay chehron aur unki sareeno per maaren gay
Yeh iss bina per kay yeh woh raah chalay jiss say unhon ney Allah ko naraz kerdiya aur unhon ney uss ki raza mandi ko bura jana to Allah ney unkay aemaal ikarat ker diye
Kiya unn logon ney jinkay dilon mein beemari hai yeh samjh rakha hai kay Allah unkay keeno ko zahir hi na keray ga

Aur agar hum chahtay to unn sabb ko tujhay dikha detay pus tu unhen unn kay chehron say hi pehchan leta aur yaqeenan tu unhen unki baat kay dhab say pehchan leyga tumharay sabb kaam Allah ko maloom hain
Yaqeenan hum tumhara imtehan keren gay takay tum mein say jihad kernay walon aur sabar kerney walon ko zahir kerden aur hum tumhari halaton ki bhi jaanch kerlen

Yaqeenan jinn logon ney kufur kiya aur Allah ki raah say logon ko roka aur rasool ki mukhalifat ki iss kay baad kay unn kay liye hidayat zahir ho chuki yeh hergiz hergiz Allah ka kuch nuksan na keren gay. Unqareeb inn kay aemaal woh ghaarat ker dey ga
